• get_base_import_path
  • BASE_IMPORT_PATH
  • get_pip_version
  • is_type_checking
  • MYPY_RUNNING
   1 # -*- coding=utf-8 -*-
   2 """
   3 Module with functionality to learn about the environment.
   4 """
   5 from __future__ import absolute_import
   6 
   7 import importlib
   8 import os
   9 
  10 
  11 def get_base_import_path():
  12     base_import_path = os.environ.get("PIP_SHIMS_BASE_MODULE", "pip")
  13     return base_import_path
  14 
  15 
  16 BASE_IMPORT_PATH = get_base_import_path()
  17 
  18 
  19 def get_pip_version(import_path=BASE_IMPORT_PATH):
  20     try:
  21         pip = importlib.import_module(import_path)
  22     except ImportError:
  23         if import_path != "pip":
  24             return get_pip_version(import_path="pip")
  25         else:
  26             import subprocess
  27 
  28             version = subprocess.check_output(["pip", "--version"])
  29             if version:
  30                 version = version.decode("utf-8").split()[1]
  31                 return version
  32             return "0.0.0"
  33     version = getattr(pip, "__version__", None)
  34     return version
  35 
  36 
  37 def is_type_checking():
  38     try:
  39         from typing import TYPE_CHECKING
  40     except ImportError:
  41         return False
  42     return TYPE_CHECKING
  43 
  44 
  45 MYPY_RUNNING = os.environ.get("MYPY_RUNNING", is_type_checking())
